title: Aveda Pure Abundance Volumizing Shampoo, 8.5-Ounce Bottle
description: Aveda Pure Abundance Volumizing Shampoo helps create a fullness for fine hair. Builds body and volume, with certified organic acacia gum from Chad, and Africa for hair that looks fuller and feels thicker. People-tested. Made in USA.

title: Shea Terra Authentic African Black Soap 5 oz.
description: Shea Terra Authentic African Black Soap 5 oz. Shea Terra Authentic African Black Soap 5 oz. 100% Natural. Genuine African black soap for smooth, blemish free skin. Ancient formula naturally breaks down dead skin revealing firmer, younger looking skin beneath. Ingredients: USDA certified organic, virgin coconut cream oil, African black soap (cocoa pod ash, plaintain peel ash, palm oil, camwood), 24% USDA certified organic shea butter, certified organic, extra virgin olive oil, spring water, sodium hydroxide
